'''''What's the Matter?''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to try all dishes made by Jafar during the [[Daily Commission]] ''[[Eat and Learn]]''. These are [[Minty Bean Soup]], [[Panipuri]] and [[Shawarma Wrap]].
